column1: I received a sample of the Clearly Brighter Brightening & Smoothing Daily Moisturizer in something ordered from Walmart, used it and went to Walmart and purchased it today. I could see a difference in my skin within 2 days [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried a sample Clearly Brighter by way of Walgreens and I'd definitely buy it! Aside from the SPF that should be higher than 15, I love that it's lightweight and has a lovely citrusy scent. it's like vitamin C in moisturizer form! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Got this as a sample and it's amazing I wear it when I get up in the morning after I wash my face. I will be purchasing the entire kit. Can't wait to see if the rest is as refreshing as the moisturizer. What caught my eye was that it has sunscreen which is much needed in this summer weather. Will be giving a review on the other products once I purchase them. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Hi ,my name is Karianne and I do whatever I can to keep my face clear and healthy .So I got clearly brighter as a sample and I thought to myself it going to just leave my face oily .The thing is it didn't clearly brighter works so good .My friends keep asking me how I keep my face so clear and I told them and they were like we have to got some that . Normally I don't fill out surveys ,but this time I am because this product is amazing .Two thumbs up! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I LOVE this product! It has enough SPF for daily use, it is lightweight, but moisturizing, and best of all, my skin looks amazing after one week! I have actually stopped using foundation all-over my face and have gotten compliments on how great my skin looks! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love how smoothly this slides across my face and how hydrated and nourished my skin feels after use. It lasts all day, too. I use it before my make up because it helps my makeup go on better and really makes a difference in the way my foundation looks. I've used other moisturizers before my makeup before but this is by far the best.
Absorbs into skin quickly and leaves your face with a glowing complextion. Doesn't add oil or cause breakouts. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was so surprised at how much I liked this product. First off, it smells amazing. Second, it really does brighten your skin. Just after using it every day for 7 days, my skin was clearer and brighter. I would definitely recommend this product to friends who like drug store skin care products.

So tried this Garnier moisturizer given to me by Allure Beauty Enthusiasts & Garnier for review for the 7 days once a day every morning! Noticed right away after day 3 the more even skin tone, subtle glow & smoother skin! I love how light it is and how it protects my skin! This is definitely my new favorite moisturizer!! #GarnierSkinActive #AllureBeautyEnthusiasts

I have been using this moisturizer for about 2 years and haven't wanted to use anything else! It is light and airy, and keeps my skin looking bright and blemish free! Without this product, my skin looks bumpy and I start to break out a little more. I decided to write a review because this is a moisturizer I really love and hope I never have to go without!

I don't want nor like the smell of sunscreen on my face. My makeup has sunscreen, cant tell it. This I can tell. It smells and feels like I am putting sunscreen on my face. I bought it because of the Vitamin C and brightening properties but I really don't think there is much of that in there. I think it is mainly sunscreen. I wear powder foundation and it effects the way my brush works with my foundation. I wont purchase again unless I can find it with no sunscreen and give that a shot.
My skin feels so great and revitalized. I did not notice a change in the brightness or tone buy the product is definitely amazing!

I bought this on a whim, and it was the best purchase I've ever made for my skin. I had really bad acne in my forehead which resulted in horrible scars. This product really helped get rid of those dark spots, it smells great and it has SPF which is a total win! I've told 3 of my girlfriends to buy it and they all love it. I love it so much that I repurchased it. I'm really looking forward to trying more things from this line!

I received a sample with a purchase I made from ULTA. I love it! It made my skin smooth and added a nice glow. Will most definitely be going to purchase a full size. It's amazing and works well under makeup which is a plus for me!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got a sample of this with my micellar water and became obsessed. I've been using for about a month and ended up buying the full product. I have oily/combination skin and it leaves my skin really hydrated without being greasy. It really brightened up my skin and gives me a healthy glow. It minimized my breakouts and feels so fresh. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My son came home from college and brought this with him, he told me to try it and I have been using it since September and there has been a dramatic change for the good in our skins appearance. I am 60 yrs old and it has made me extremely happy to use it in my daily routine. I ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND THIS TO ALL AGES

I tried this this morning and OMG it made my skin softer on the spot! I have dry cheeks and jaw line like super scaly and after my morning exfoliation, applied a coat and loved how soft and non-greasy it made my face. I'm definitely will be using more of this product.

I was fortunate enough to get this product as part of a CROWDTAP challenge. Otherwise, I might never have tried it and that would have been sad. I LOVE this product. I have been using it faithfully since I first got the sample bottle and people have commented on how much younger I look and have even asked me what I am doing differently. You can bet I will continue to use this product. My skin looks and feels better and I love the fresh clean smell.

I Love it. It moisturizers but doesnlt leave an oily residue. I feel like it doesn't clog up more nearly as bad as other products I have tried. I recieved a little sample in the mail to try. And I loved it. Great Product. I will be buying some of this for myself!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love that it's oil free because it is easier to apply it on my face. It hydrated and nourished my skin right before I applied my makeup. I am not a makeup expert but I found that my makeup can last longer when I used it as my moisturizer. I also like how the foundation blended with it. I'll probably use this more as a makeup base than as a daily moisturizer because of this discovery.

I recieved a sample of this in the mail, and it actually exceeded my expectations. On my 5th day of using it I could already see how great is was working with my skin, it felt rejuvenated and had a gorgeous glow to it. Would definitely recommend this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this as a sample in a magazine and couldn't wait to try it out. Firstly, it's nice to receive a sample that is ample size - there is plenty to cover your face for a couple of days. I loved the way it smells fresh and is so light on your skin - soaks in straight away. I will definitely be buying this when next at the store. 5/5!

I recieved a sample in the mail. Loved it so much, I made a trip to the store just to pick it up for the next morning. Loved it! It feels much better on my skin than a name brand moisturizer that I have been using for at least 10 years or more....I'm hooked [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

ABSOLUTELY LOVE! It has everything all in one...it instantly smooths my skin, hydrates my complexion, lightens my acne scars, and has SPF! Amazing product that I'm telling my friends all about! I wish the bottle would come a little larger and a little more affordable, but I guess I'm getting a good deal for all it does for me :) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried the sample I got in the store . I like the texture and the scent. I t really works immediately . I am a 50+ women with fair skin and I tend to get some redness on my cheeks. It evens out my skin tone. I wish it had a higher spf because I live in Florida [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like the smell and the lightness of this product. I hesitate to try new products because of the outcome of heavy product that makes my face break out. The fact that this product evened out my face and made my skin look fresh has made me a admirer of this product line. I look forward to trying other products within the Garnier skincare line.

I recieved a free sample of this product and have used it ever since. It is not greasy and my skin at 60 is in good condition. I need the spf in it as well. I use it day and night. You do not even feel it on your skin it is so light but effects are noticable. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a sample and decided to give it a try. Loved the feel on my face, make my skin look brighter and was not oily. Bonus was the billt in sunscreen I highly recommend this product as it both protects and sooths. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love this product! It works really well. Makes my skin feel refreshed and looking really healthy and beautiful:)

I am 68 years old and never had any compliments on my skin (as a teenager, I had acne). I have been using this Garnier product for several months and have been told that my skin is "luminous". Great product, highly recommend.

I've been using this for two years and absolutely love it. It makes my skin glow and it goes on very smooth. I have combination skin and it's not too drying or oily it's just right. But more recently it's been difficult to find in nearby stores.
I received a sample in one of my magazines and I have to say I love this very much! Will definitely buy it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I received a sample and tried used it as my night cream. Left my skin feeling refreshed and clean. Goes on smooth. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I got a sample of this in the mail and I love the way it makes my skin feel. My skin is smoother, brighter and has a more even tone. Very nice. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used the sample I received and really like the way my skin feels and looks. I did not like the fragrance however. It smelled too much like perfume. Is there a fragrance-free version of this product? If not, perhaps there should be.

Anything with the word "Brightening" on it, I stay away from due to my oily skin. But this is amazing to my face! Left it so soft and incredibly bright and kept my oil at bay. I love this! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got this as a sample in my Pinch Me box and it is absolutely amazing. I want to use it every day! It feels so light and has an amazing smell. You have got to try it out!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Besides the great citrusy smell, this is great for my skin. Very refreshing. Will be part of my daily routine! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I like this product. It is as described and not oily.

I was out looking for a new moisturizer. I had used Aveeno for years, but for whatever reason after having my baby in January it was causing me to breakout! I wanted something to give me a glow, even without makeup. This product did just that. It was about a week when I started noticing. I have never felt very comfortable without makeup, but I do now. its helped with evening and brightening. I also have used it over my red stretch marks and they have faded VERY quickly. (: This product is amazing.

I've been enjoying a sample of Clearly Brighter for a week, and am already noticing a more evenly mositurized skin. I love that it's not too oily, and doesn't result in a shiny face. So far, my often sensitive skin is very receptive to this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is hands down the best daily facial moisturizer I have ever used. Before buying this product, I had never used a moisturizer on my face before, so I wasn't really sure what to expect. It is so light and creamy, it glides on the skin very smoothly, and doesn't leave it feeling greasy. It also absorbs into the skin very quickly, and after only using it a few times, I could already notice a difference in my skin. Would highly recommend this product!!

I like this product because you don't need a separate sunscreen and moisturizer. This lotion gets the job done in one step. It is great under makeup and it doesn't 'pill' like some products do when I apply my foundation. The scent is light and fresh so I don't think it will bother sensitive noses. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really love the feel of this moisturizer, it absorbs quickly and doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy like many sunblocks do. However the scent is so strong it makes me sneeze and is aggravating to my eyes. I wouldn't recommend this product if you have sensitive skin or are irritated by perfumes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer absorbs very quickly, has no residue left after the application and smells wonderfully. One draw-back is the low SP factor. Time will show if it visibly brightens my skin. I am OK with this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been looking for something that would diminish my scars and make my Casper the Friendly Ghost-like skin look radiant (not SCARY) for YEARS... and here it FINALLY is! Not only is this moisturizer MUCH less harsh than the glycolic acid peels & toners I'd been trying for the past few months, but it even makes my pores look smaller PLUS it has SPF!!! Thank You, Garnier! Everything I wanted in a nourishing & brightening moisturizer in ONE bottle--my dreams have FINALLY come true!

I love this product! I'very used it f8r several days now. The consistency is light, yet it does a great job mositurizing. I skin feels baby soft, more smooth, and just all around great! The scent is soft and pleasant. I cannot believe how great my skin feels, I will be purchasing the full size soon!
im a beauty advisor been using 2 weeks and its the best hands down skin looks and feels soft and glowy..
I received a sample I love it I recommend to all my friends [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I received this as a sample and now it is part of my daily routine! I would really recommend to someone who is looking for a new face moisturizer
Fabulous product. It melts into your skin, making it smooth and youthful. Love, love love it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Balances the oils in my face and definitely brightens my tone! Absolutely love it! Buying more! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I used the coupon and tried Clearly Brighter. My skin felt smooth and polished, great product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got a sample in my Fabletics package. Really like the lightweight, absorbable moisture unlike many similar products with sunscreen. Definitely easy to use every day, all seasons, rain or shine! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This fast became my favorite moisturizer, easy to use, with continued use, it has diminished my sun spots, which I love!!! I love the smell as well! Many thanks to Allure for the free sample! #GarnierSkinActive #AllureBeautyEnthusiasts

I love this product. I have combination skin and this is great! I'm a forty one year old mom and my age is really starting to show...so far this mortified has been my saving grace. I love the light feel and the mild scent. Thank you!!
Good product

This product is wonderful! Immediately, my skin felt bright, soft, and smooth even in the middle of a cold winter month!!. I have large pores and Clearly Brighter reduced the size of them right away. And the best part is that it was gentle on my sensitive skin!! LOVE! My only personal wish is that it was slightly more creamy, but that could be because it is winter. But otherwise, I love it!! Good job Garnier!!

I got a sample of this to try from one of my magazines. I liked how easy it absorbed into my skin, and it felt light upon application. The citrus smell was a little strong for me, but pleasant. I wish it was more orange smelling than lemon, since the stronger lemon scent made it seem like I was applying a kitchen cleaner to my face, but that is also a personal preference (I don't like lemon smelling things).

I received a sample of the clearly brighter and am impressed! While I didn't have enough to use for an entire week, I loved how light and non greasy this was and how quickly it absorbed into my skin. I will be purchasing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this as a sample and figured I would try it out since my skin gets so dry around this time of the year. I am SHOCKED at how smooth and nourished my skin feels after a few days of applying this after my shower. Seriously, I love this product!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I actually used the little trial packet that I got in my magazine and after a shower I decided to put it on so I'd have fresh clean skin...within minutes my face felt clean and fresh and smooth. I will definitely be buying to full size product along with looking at all the other Garnier skin active products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

To be honest this was my first time using a Garnier product. I was utterly amazed by how it performed. It was silky, smooth and felt clean going on my face. To know it also had sunscreen and was oil-free was a bonus. I would definitely recommend it to my friends and continue to use it as part of my daily beauty regime. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a free sample from pinchme and After a few days of use my skin is more even toned its softer and brighter it doesn't leave your face feeling sticky. I love it! As soon as I run out I'm running to buy a bottle. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Found a sample in a magazine, and decided to try it out...who wouldn't want brighter skin? I got two uses out of the sample, and I was impressed by how soft my face and neck were. Did not see any change in the brightness of my skin, but maybe with more product, I will!

I absolutely loved this moisturizer! I was a little skeptical at first because I usually use very expensive facial products but this moisturizer is affordable and the quality is amazing. I love that it helps even and brighten my skin tone as well as have spf 15. The smell of it is also quite pleasant. Will definitely recommend this product.

The results I noticed from a small sample mirrored the light silky feeling of putting this on my face! My face felt fresh and rejuvenated and this was just within a couple of days. The smell of this product also made me excited to use it. Nothing better than hitting so many senses in a positive way FIRST thing in the morning! I loved this and plan on making my first purchase of it when I get to the store!

I previously bought the Garnier SkinActive in a fragrance free bottle. I tried the Clearly Brighter, and I loved the smell! It's really fresh and doesn't smell like sunscreen at all. Once it is on, it takes about 4-5 minutes before my skin is feeling smooth and clean. It doesn't feel like a sunscreen even though it has SPF 15 in it. I am definitely going to get more!

This is the first moisturizer to not irritate my skin. My skin is oily so when ever i use anything on it it just feels like it sits there. This product is light wheight and absorbs into my skin no problem. Love that it has sunscreen since i live where its always sunny.

I've only tried this as a sample for two days and I see the difference. It's not a super dramatic one but for only two days, I'm impressed. My skin soaked it right up and it's not heavy nor greasy. This is like an energy drink for my face. It's brighter and I look alive. I also use the BB cream after and my skin looks great.

I received a free sample through Crowdtap. And I am happy that I did. I liked the fact that this product has sunscreen in it and helps my skin become an even tone. Which I need as I am getting older. Can't wait to see the improvement in a week. Thanks for the all in one. It isn't greasy or anything.
Smells good, goes on smooth makes my face feel good.
I love the way my skin feels after using this product. No more dry tight skin.
I really like this product, It is a great moisturizer and I can feel it working!
Received on 5/20/19. Shows expired on 04/19. They should not sell expired products. Disappointing.
A little above my budget, but it doesn't irritate my skin or make it oily! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Good product! Absorbs quickly. I tried the sample I got from magazine. Love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review. I have been using this product for two weeks now and absolutely love it. It leaves my skin smooth and radiant. I would highly recommend this product.

I only got the small sample and i put a little on my face and it feels like a baby's butt its so soft i love it my face has never felt this good. Im not going to wear makeup today because of it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I Got A Sample Of The Daily Mosturizer & Fell In Love With It . I Got Great Results Within A Week ! Doesn't Leave My Skin Oily , My Skin Tone Appears More Even , & My Face Just Looks Very Healthy ! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
brightened my skin in less than a week, all of my acne scars have gotten at least 3 times brighter and that was just with a sample! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Started using clearly brighter daily moisturizer love it leaves my skin feeling smoother and brighter looking and it has sunscreen too what a product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I am 57 years young and have used Clearly Brighter for over 3 months.
I could not be more satisfied with the product.
My skin is soft and almost perfectly smooth for a lady of my age. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really love this product. It feels great and spreads evenly on my skin. Friends my age have been complimenting me on how my face looks and of course I have to share my new found friend - Garnier SkinActive Clearly Brighter.
I could not recommend this product. I applied to my face and immediately felt a burning sensation. I have sensitive skin, so this product is not for me.

I got a sample of this and used it and loved the results that I got. I used the coupon that came with the sample to buy a full size bottle and I am very pleased so far. My skin looks brighter, clearer, and smoother than it has in a very long time.
this product feels good on face, unfortunately, the active ingredient is not recommended if you are using it for the purpose of SFP. There's no zinc oxcide and titanium as the first ingredients.

I used the sample was very impressed went to the store to buy it and the price of extremely to high for me Will definitely have to wait until it's on sale with a coupon attached would like the dark circle corrector as well but all the products seem to be a little bit pricey for my budget overall the clearly brighter skin was obtainable so I would love to see the results for the dark circle product but truly I can't afford it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I bought this product along with the tinted moisturizer, under eye roller, and face wash. I've used the previous bb cream and other products in my daily makeup routine, but when I decided to upgrade to these new and improved products, after a few days of wearing, my face is completely broken out :( I loved the old moisturizer and bb cream, but sadly this one made my skin red and blotchy.

From what I can tell on my fairer skin, this sunscreen doesn't leave a white cast. It does absorb but still leaves skin oily and does give me a few whiteheads. Under my makeup it gives me a dewey look (I have dry skin). Has a chemically, floral scent which I have also experienced with garniers bb cream that i do NOT enjoy. Burns my eyes a little if i apply to my bags. I prefer the Neutrogena ultra sheer dry touch sunscreen but will use up my sample of this.

I really like this moisturizer because it keeps my face protected in my day to day life. The spf 15 isn't much, but since I work a desk job, it is just fine. It has a really nice light scent, and absorbs quickly into my skin. I keep an spf 50 on hand for longer periods of time outside because I am very pale and burn easily. I have had no issues with this product.

This moisturizer is great! It has good texture and absorbs quickly, so I don't have greasy feeling on my face. Besides it has very pleasant scent. What I also appreciate is that it has SPF to protect my skin during the day. Overall, I have a very positive experience with the product and would definitely buy a full size. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Overall, I liked the product. I didn't love the smell of the product. It smelled like old people lotion. It did do a good job of keeping my skin moisturized, and worked just as well as my current product that I've been using for 10 years. I would consider purchasing this if it had a different smell. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Very nice and light weight moisturizer. Once dry it feels like nothing is there which I love. I even wear this at night after I wash my face because it is the right balance of moisture. So far, it hasn't upset my skin at all so that's a plus as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I wanted to love this so bad but it let me down! It dried out my normally oily skin way tooooooo much!! It is very mattifying which makes my face flake and putting on makeup a nightmare. I had to rewash my face and put on my normal face moisturizer, because the Garnier one was awful. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Ii did try clearly brighter moisturizer i broke out not sure if it was because of my skin type or age hitting 40 and have it all peach fuzz frown lines crows feet dry patches discoloration even achne and bothe oily and dry skin [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I already own a slightly different kind of Garnier facial moisturizer so I was excited to try something a little different while knowing it wouldn't give me a bad reaction or anything. I even gave it to my husband after he came home with a really bad sunburn, and it worked really well for him even when he was peeling. I don't use moisturizer as often as I should, but I'm really happy that this is a good size sample because I can take it with me on my upcoming trip :) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product," clearly brighter brightening & smoothing daily moisturizer " is a good moisturizer that has some sun protection built in with it. I have used the sample and have noticed brighter and smoother skin. I would recommend [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I been exploring Garnier's products, so I was happy to receive a sample of Garnier Clearly Brighter Brightening and Smoothing Daily Moisturizer SPF 15. With Summer here we need to use a sunscreen. Garnier gives us this and adds in a moisturizer too. I found the moisturizer to be refreshing creamy and left my skin smooth. I would recommend this Garnier's product to buy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really liked this moisturizer. It is lightweight and feels very smooth and silky on the face, probably because of the silicone (dimethicone) in it. It also wears nice under makeup. The only thing I did not care for that much is the fragrance, but at least it does not smell like sunscreen. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like this moisturizer a lot. It is easy to apply, smells nice, and keeps my skin moisturized and free from daily sun damage. I will definitely buy it when this sample runs out. Nice product for everyday use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I never use moisturizer because I've had bad reactions to it, but I absolutely love this product. My skin is sensitive and great but it felt clear and weightless on my face. I love how it has spf in it too! I will absolutely purchase the product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The product claims to be a moisturizer but it's really just sunscreen. It's sunscreen that doesn't dry out your skin. There is so much fragrance in the product to mask the sunscreen odors that it was nauseating. You cannot apply to eye area just like sunscreen. I can apply my own moisturizer to the eye area, which also needs moisturizing. Product is incorrectly named. Market product as only sunscreen and not a daily moisturizer. Also, fix the fragrance. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is definitely one of my favorites for the summer. I love that it has spf in it for those days that I am just running out to the store or riding in the car. I feel good knowing that I still have some protection. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used this product very reluctantly since I don't like to put heavy moisturizers and creams on my face. I was surprised at how smooth my skin felt after I applied it. Within days, I noticed a difference in my skin. It looks much fresher than normal without any residue. I love this product and highly recommend it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was skeptical when I first tried product because I have dry skin due to menopause I guess. Wow, was I surprised hoe nice it went on, the smell is great, you do not need to use that much, a little goes a long way! I have been using it everyday and I do plan on Purchasing it when it is all gone! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I did like this moisturizer, but my skin has been extra dry lately and this didn't quite cut it for me. I really enjoyed the smell and the product felt really nice to put on. Unfortunately it wasn't enough for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I liked what i was able to use in my sample but i wasnt able to see any positive efeects because there wasnt enough to judge on. I however liked what i saw and will be purchasing a bigger bottle to be able to thoroughly see how my skin reacts over time [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love a good moisturizer and it has SPF 15 I am sold. The Clearly Brighter Brightening & Smoothing Daily Moisterizer SPF 15 is so worth it. even the sample size is perfect. so silky. Doesn't clog up my pores. i barely feel it but I've been out all summer and my skin hasn't burned and my skin feels supple. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

When summer rolls around I am attracted to anything that glows!! This lotion doesn't disappoint, it makes me skin look radiant without being glittery or sparkly. I have used this almost every day this summer so far and love the way it makes my skin look, the smell (not really one) and the non greasy finish. Perfect everyday lotion that helps to protect your skin is a winner in my book! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Its a great product but i have never been loyal to any beauty regimen. I always end up buying products and they end up under my bathroom sink and i throw them out when i need the space. But i liked how it made my skin feel. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved the smell of the product but after using it I felt like my skin felt like it had more oil than normal. Also I would like it if it had a higher spf at least 30.So since I do want to use a moisturizer I don't want one to cause my skin to break out more from oil. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

There are so many different products that make the same claims so at first I thought this was just another one of those. I noticed immediately after applying to my face and before I put my makeup on that my skin felt smoother which helped with the makeup process. Also, the SPF is an added bonus. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have tried various products over the years, as my skin's needs have changed. I had tried a few Garnier products, but not this particular one, so I was interested to see how it worked. I enjoyed my trial, and plan to purchase it. I am looking forward to seeing what the long term effects of this product are, and I'm hopeful to see a change in the overall appearance of my skin and evenness of tone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Smells a little like sunscreen but that doesn't bother me. I feel like it keeps my skin moisturized for a long time throughout the day.
